Canada, do not fall into the trap of thinking this is not our problem. It is our problem & we have a duty to do something about it.
If we are serious about fighting Trumpism & far right fascism in Canada, this is how we can prove it right now. Do not be silent.
I encourage you to do what you can to do the same. Email or write, or visit your MP in person if possible.
My anxiety makes speaking on the phone very difficult. I plan to do everything I can to make calls b/c this is vitally important.
You can also contact RH Trudeau's office directly here. Do both. https://t.co/SO4y5yq1cw
If you do know know who your local MP is, there is a search function to input your post code to find out. https://t.co/wpvxJgnVoY
Here is a list of Canadian MPs & their contact info locally and on Parliament hill. Make your voice heard. https://t.co/wpvxJgnVoY
We pride ourselves on being diverse, humanitarians & peacekeepers. We fall short often. This is how we can start to earn those titles.
Call, email, write, visit your MPs and ask they pressure Parliament to allow entry to those stranded at the US ports of entry.
